meanings.sent1: He is dumber than the other students in class.
meanings.sent2: She felt dumber after staying up late studying.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked dumber than usual when it tried to catch its tail.
meanings.sent4: The plan to build a house of cards was dumber than expected.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds made the landscape look dumber than ever before.

meanings.definition: Less intelligent or capable than others.
meanings.sent1: The older phone model is dumber compared to the new one.
meanings.sent2: He felt dumber than his friends when it came to solving puzzles.
meanings.sent3: The idea of wearing socks with sandals seemed even dumber in the rain.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to skip breakfast was dumber than a rock trying to swim.
meanings.sent5: The maze became dumber with each wrong turn he made.
